article.title: Welcome to ZeroNet
article.text:
{{external media|image1=https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmbRXW7fYPwiNjA4GwpMLRPugZDYQgf94rEgr9ihoJoNtc/Pon-una-wiki-en-tu-vida.jpg}} Ahmed [[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. [[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works. ==Useful pages== * [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]] * [[zite|What is a "Zite"?]] * [[List of Zites]] * [[blocklists|Blocked Zeronet Sites]] * [[zearch|Search engine]] * [[zerome|What is ZeroMe?]] * [[hubs|List of ZeroMe Hubs]] * [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]] * [[proxies|List of proxies allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]] * [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]] * [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox you can play with it before editing other pages]] * [[devresources|List of resources for ZeroNet and Zite development]] ==Useful wikis== * [zero://1LX2wiouHctuUXtu5WkVM9TJJ3YoL6gAfm/ New ZeroWiki] - Clone of ZeroWiki with more information and better organization. * [zero://1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/ ZeroTuto, learning resources and tutorials related to ZeroNet] Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].
